content: Darius, you deserve a medal. Great article, covering important points. And well written! If it helps, we’ve developed an enterprise writing coach that highlights people’s blind spots in writing, such as the academic and business phrases you mentioned — and lots of other issues, like passive voice, long sentences, nominalised verbs, etc. It’s at www.credosity.com If people enter DARIUS as a coupon when downloading it, we’ll double their free trial to 60 days. Thanks for helping the world write better, Darius.
